title: Ticket #2727: test_init_from_string_* unit tests are useless
description: In the unit tests, in file OTEST_Old_Classads.cpp, the test functions test_init_from_string_*() aren't testing anything and will always pass. They allocate an empty classad using new, call ClassAd::initFromString() with various arguments, then check whether the pointer returned by new is NULL. If the pointer isn't NULL, the test passes. If it had been NULL, the program would have crashed.
